actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to provide that the definition of "local government" includes certain nonprofit camp meeting associations that maintain public facilities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to include within the definition of "local government" for purposes of assistance under such Act any nonprofit camp meeting association in existence on the date of enactment of this Act that maintains one or more public facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to provide that the definition of "local government" includes certain nonprofit camp meeting associations that maintain public facilities, and for other purposes.
